post_text:
Middle School Supply List - Grades 6-8

6 - one subject notebooks

6- Individual folders (one per subject)

1- Pencil Box/Bag (recommended)

2- pens or pencils (pencils required for math)

1-Hand held Pencil sharpener

1- Small rounded scissors

1- Colored pencils/markers/crayons (pencils recommended for Math/Science/STEM)

2-Highlighters

2-Glue sticks

1-Basic 4-function calculator (recommended)

Loose lined paper

1- Individual water bottle strongly recommended for refilling water stations, as traditional water fountain will not be in service for health reasons.

Masks (required)

Individual hand sanitizer (if desired)

shared_text:
Ashley Community Schools
August 3 at 9:49 AM ¬∑

Dear Ashley Families,

It has been our pleasure providing the Ashley Community meals these past several months. Since March 16th we have provided over 46,000 meals for you.

However, we now need to shift our focus to Returning to School. With this being said, the Final Day of Meals Delivery Program will be: Monday, August 10th

We are looking forward to providing your students with our normal School Meals Program on August 25. Be it in our classroom / cafeteria or the virtual pick-up option.

Respectfully,

Ashley‚Äôs Food Service and Transportation Teams

post_text: Back to School Committee Update: The committee met tonight and finalized the Back to School plan. This plan will be presented to the Board of Education on Tuesday night for approval. Once the plan is approved, parents and students will receive more information. Please note: There will be a face-to-face instruction option, as well as a virtual option. If you are considering schooling your students from home and are interested in the virtual option please call 989-847-4000 ext. 1003 or email dehardman@ashleyschools.net to express your interest. Thank you and please be watching for more information next week.

post_text: Back to School Update: We would like to thank all of those who participated in the Back to School Survey. We have been reviewing the responses and are continuing to work on a plan that meets the state requirements, as well as the needs of our students, staff and families. This is a very in depth process. There have been multiple meetings/webinars involved which have allowed us to gather information and apply it to the plan for Ashley Community Schools. Please be assured that as this plan is developed it has the safety of all students, staff and your family in mind. Again, thank you and have a great weekend.

There have been multiple meetings/webinars involved which have allowed us to gather information and apply it to the plan for Ashley Community Schools. Please be assured that as this plan is developed it has the safety of all students, staff and your family in mind. Again, thank you and have a great weekend.

post_text: The last packet delivery will be tomorrow, June 3rd. Please place all completed packets, library books and textbooks on the door in a plastic bag. Also, for the safety of our staff please tie up any animals or place them in the house. Thank you.
